title: Infrastructure Bootstrap and DevOps Setup
description: Establish foundational infrastructure including cloud accounts, networking, CI/CD pipelines, secrets management, monitoring, and observability. Deploy base services such as Aurora Serverless, DynamoDB, S3 buckets with lifecycle policies, and initial security configurations including WAF and IAM roles. Implement feature flagging system with two-person approval and audit logging. Prepare sandbox environments with synthetic data and simulators for training and testing.
acceptance_criteria: Cloud infrastructure deployed with secure networking and IAM roles
CI/CD pipelines operational with feature flag support and audit trails
Sandbox environment seeded with synthetic data and simulators
Monitoring and alerting dashboards live with baseline SLAs
Security controls including WAF, Secrets Manager, and KMS implemented

title: Core Data Models and Event Pipeline Implementation
description: Define and implement core data models for users, service profiles, studios, bookings, payments, messaging, reviews, promotions, trust & safety, and admin audit logs. Build event ingestion pipeline with schema validation, privacy enforcement, and tiered Bronze/Silver/Gold data layers. Implement data quality, lineage, and retention policies with DSAR support. Establish analytics semantic layer with KPIs and dashboards. Integrate with external adapters for payments, ID verification, background checks, social metrics, and content safety.
acceptance_criteria: Core data schemas deployed with constraints and indexes
Event ingestion pipeline validates and stores events with privacy enforcement
Data quality and lineage monitoring active with alerts
DSAR export and deletion workflows operational
Analytics dashboards display key KPIs with freshness SLAs
External adapter integrations functional and emitting events

title: Authentication, Authorization, and User Onboarding
description: Implement user authentication flows including email, Apple, Google, optional SMS MFA, password reset, and account deletion with DSAR export. Enforce rate limits and lockouts. Build onboarding wizards for buyers, sellers, and hosts with role selection, profile creation, package/pricing setup, availability, verification nudges, and publish checklists. Integrate ID verification gating Instant Book and payouts. Implement Safe-Mode defaults and age gating. Provide profile and studio editing with media upload and moderation.
acceptance_criteria: Authentication flows secure and rate-limited
Onboarding wizard complete with step gating and autosave
ID verification gating Instant Book and payouts enforced
Safe-Mode and age gating applied on public profiles
Media upload with moderation and SFW enforcement
Profile completeness scoring and publish checklists functional

title: Search Infrastructure and API Development
description: Build search indexing pipelines for People and Studios with Typesense (default) and optional OpenSearch. Implement schemas with facets, filters, sorting, synonyms, typo tolerance, and Safe-Mode filtering. Develop GraphQL search APIs with cursor pagination, caching, rate limits, and error handling. Provide autocomplete and query suggestions. Implement paid promotions with CPC floors, density caps, eligibility gates, and fraud detection. Admin consoles for search curation, synonym management, and invalid click dashboards.
acceptance_criteria: Search indices updated within 5 minutes of data changes
GraphQL search API supports all filters, sorting, and pagination
Safe-Mode filtering enforced on public queries
Autocomplete and suggestions functional with typo tolerance
Paid promotions integrated with eligibility and fraud controls
Admin tools for curation and monitoring operational
Search latency and error SLOs met

title: Booking and Checkout System
description: Implement booking state machine supporting Instant Book, Request-to-Book, and Smart Invites with calendar holds, conflict detection, and travel fee calculations. Integrate Stripe Connect for payments with escrow-like capture, deposits, refunds, chargebacks, and payouts with reserves and early payout options. Enforce docs-before-pay with Smart Docs CMS generating role- and city-aware contracts requiring e-signatures. Provide atomic Linked Booking Group (LBG) confirmation with separate ledgers for Talent and Studios. Admin consoles for finance, refunds, and payout holds with dual approvals and audit logs.
acceptance_criteria: Booking modes and state transitions implemented with calendar conflict checks
Stripe payments integrated with escrow, deposits, refunds, and chargebacks
Smart Docs CMS generates and manages e-sign contracts blocking payment until signed
Atomic LBG confirmation with separate Talent and Studio ledgers
Admin finance consoles with dual approvals and immutable audit logs
Payouts scheduled with reserve and early payout controls
SLOs for checkout latency and payment success met

title: Messaging and Inbox System
description: Develop role- and booking-aware messaging threads with Inquiry and Project kinds, supporting message requests with accept/decline/block, action cards for booking management, attachments with virus and NSFW scans, read receipts, typing indicators, and Safe-Mode previews. Implement inbox with folders, filters, search, pin/archive, and rate limits with spam detection and anti-circumvention. Notifications via email, push, and in-app with quiet hours and digest batching. Admin consoles for moderation, case-bound access, and immutable audit logs.
acceptance_criteria: Messaging threads support Inquiry and Project types with role and booking context
Message requests gate new contacts with accept/decline/block and credit limits
Action cards implement booking workflows with idempotency and audit
Attachments scanned for virus and NSFW, Safe-Mode enforced on previews
Inbox supports folders, filters, search, pin/archive, and spam controls
Notifications respect quiet hours and user preferences with digest batching
Admin moderation consoles with case-bound access and immutable audit logs
Messaging latency and throughput SLOs met

title: Studio Marketplace and Management
description: Implement studio listings with detailed amenities, pricing, availability, blackout rules, deposit policies, and verification (Lite and Verified). Provide host onboarding wizard, media upload with moderation, calendar management with ICS export and import, and post-booking adjustments with deposit claims. Public studio pages with SFW media, approximate location, and SEO JSON-LD. Atomic attach-in-flow adding studios during Talent checkout with separate deposit auth. Admin consoles for verification queue, policy editing, and analytics dashboards.
acceptance_criteria: Studio listings support detailed amenities, pricing, and availability with blackout enforcement
Host onboarding wizard and media upload with moderation and Safe-Mode enforcement
Calendar management with ICS export/import and conflict detection
Deposit policies with Stripe auth-only holds and claim workflows
Public studio pages with SFW media and SEO structured data
Atomic attach-in-flow with separate deposit authorization
Admin verification queue and policy management with immutable audit logs
KPIs on publish-to-booking time, deposit claims, and verification SLA met

title: Reviews and Reputation System
description: Build role- and space-scoped reviews with star ratings, text, and structured facets, enforcing double-blind submission and eligibility from completed bookings. Implement fraud detection for self-reviews, rings, and bursts with auto-hiding and moderation queue. Compute recent-weighted reputation scores with decay and penalties. Display verified badges and reputation rings on profiles and studios. Provide admin moderation console with audit logs and appeals. Integrate with search ranking and notifications.
acceptance_criteria: Reviews accepted only from eligible completed bookings with double-blind enforcement
Fraud detection auto-hides suspicious reviews and queues for moderation
Reputation scores computed with decay and penalties, displayed with verified badges
Admin moderation console supports hide/remove/restore with immutable audit logs
Integration with search ranking and user notifications
Performance and fraud detection SLOs met

title: Trust & Safety and Verification Center
description: Implement ID verification gating Instant Book and payouts, age gating for 18+ content and FanSub creators, optional background checks granting Trusted Pro badges, and social verification via OAuth with nightly sync. Build risk scoring and payout hold logic. Enforce Safe-Mode filtering on public surfaces and search. Provide admin consoles for verification queues, adverse actions, appeals, and immutable audit logs with two-person approval. Integrate automoderation with escalating enforcement and evidence retention.
acceptance_criteria: ID verification required for Instant Book and payouts with age gating enforced
Background checks opt-in with Trusted Pro badges and fee nudges
Social verification with OAuth integration and nightly sync
Risk scoring triggers payout holds and feature gating
Safe-Mode filtering blocks NSFW content for guests and new users
Admin consoles with dual approval and immutable audit logs
Automoderation with escalating enforcement and evidence retention
SLOs for verification turnaround and moderation response met

title: Smart Docs and Legal Document Management
description: Develop a Smart Docs CMS generating versioned, auditable legal documents per booking leg, including SOWs, Model Releases, House Rules, and Addenda. Enforce docs-before-pay gating with e-signature workflows integrated with checkout. Store immutable PDFs with SHA-256 hashes and WORM retention. Support clause library with semantic versioning, city/role gating, and variable binding. Provide admin consoles for template management with dual approvals and audit logs. Integrate notifications for signing events and error handling.
acceptance_criteria: Smart Docs CMS supports versioned, role- and city-aware templates with clause library
Documents generated per booking leg with variable binding and validation
E-signature workflows block payment until all required signatures complete
Immutable PDFs stored with SHA-256 hashes and WORM retention
Admin consoles for template management with dual approval and audit logs
Notifications for signing events with retries and error handling
SLOs for document generation and signing met

title: Finance and Billing System
description: Implement platform fee and tax computation per leg with configurable rules and marketplace facilitator support. Build double-entry ledger for fees, payouts, refunds, and chargebacks with idempotent Stripe webhook reconciliation. Support buyer wallet credits and debits with idempotency and caps. Provide monthly seller and optional buyer statements with tax details. Admin consoles for fee/tax rules, wallet adjustments, GL reconciliation, and audited money-affecting actions with two-person approval. Enforce cost controls and SLOs for fee computation and daily close.
acceptance_criteria: Platform fees and taxes computed per leg with marketplace facilitator logic
Double-entry ledger with idempotent Stripe webhook reconciliation
Buyer wallet supports credits, debits, and reversals with caps
Monthly seller and buyer statements generated with tax details
Admin consoles with dual approval and immutable audit logs
Cost and performance SLOs for fee computation and daily close met

title: Communications and Notification System
description: Build a cost-efficient, privacy-safe, auditable communications layer delivering templated messages via email (SES), push (Pinpoint), SMS (SNS/Twilio), and in-app with user preferences, quiet hours, deduplication, batching, and critical message overrides. Implement immutable consent ledger and suppression lists with one-click unsubscribe. Provide admin consoles for template management, suppression viewing, and audit logs. Enforce domain authentication (SPF/DKIM/DMARC), bounce/complaint handling, and deliverability monitoring. Support localization, accessibility, and link tracking respecting privacy.
acceptance_criteria: Multi-channel templated messaging with user preferences and quiet hours
Immutable consent ledger and suppression with one-click unsubscribe
Admin consoles for template and suppression management with audit logs
Domain authentication and bounce/complaint handling implemented
Localization and accessibility compliance met
Link tracking respects privacy and DNT
Deliverability monitoring and cost controls active

title: Growth Features: Saved Searches, Boards, Referrals, and Feed
description: Implement saved searches with ANY/ALL filters, frequency caps, and Safe-Mode enforcement. Build Boards supporting People, Studios, and Portfolio items with collaborator tagging and privacy controls. Develop referral system with monthly caps, ID/device/IP fraud checks, and clawbacks on fraudulent bookings. Create unified feed with role tabs, verified badges, Safe-Mode filtering, and sharecards with UTM and QR codes. Provide Book-Again reminders with prefilled checkout drafts and opt-outs. Integrate telemetry, dashboards, and cost controls.
acceptance_criteria: Saved searches support complex filters with frequency caps and Safe-Mode
Boards manage mixed content with collaborator approvals and privacy
Referral system enforces caps, fraud detection, and clawbacks
Unified feed with role tabs, verified badges, and Safe-Mode filtering
Sharecards and link-in-bio microsites generate UTM/QR codes
Book-Again reminders with prefilled drafts and opt-out options
Telemetry and dashboards monitor usage and cost within budgets

title: Portfolio and Case Studies Management
description: Develop portfolio items with media uploads, collaborator tagging requiring approval, case studies with 'Request Similar Shoot' CTA, and Safe-Mode enforcement hiding non-SFW content. Support DMCA reporting and admin review workflows. Implement media processing pipelines with virus and NSFW scanning, watermarking, and lifecycle policies. Provide SEO with JSON-LD for SFW content and internal linking. Integrate telemetry and analytics dashboards for portfolio usage and approvals.
acceptance_criteria: Portfolio supports media upload with collaborator approval and Safe-Mode enforcement
Case studies include 'Request Similar Shoot' linking to prefilled RFPs
DMCA reports route to admin with audit and takedown workflows
Media pipeline enforces virus and NSFW scanning with watermarking
SEO JSON-LD valid and excludes non-SFW content
Telemetry and dashboards track portfolio engagement and approvals

title: FanSubscription Creator Features
description: Implement FanSubscription creator storefronts with subscription management, paid custom requests, tips, and PPV content gated by 18+ ID verification and Safe-Mode. Support media watermarking, entitlement tokens, and immutable manifests for deliverables. Integrate Stripe billing with subscription and payment flows, dunning, refunds, and disputes. Provide moderation and DMCA workflows with escalation and appeals. Build GraphQL APIs and admin consoles for eligibility, refunds, and finance with audit logs.
acceptance_criteria: FanSub creators manage subscriptions, requests, tips, and PPV with 18+ gating
Media watermarking and entitlement tokens enforce access control
Stripe billing integrated with subscription lifecycle and refunds
Moderation and DMCA workflows with audit and appeals implemented
GraphQL APIs and admin consoles support eligibility and finance operations
Telemetry and KPIs monitor earnings, churn, and moderation

title: Help Center and Support Ticketing System
description: Build a Help Center with categorized articles, markdown support, search, and guided troubleshooters opening typed support cases. Implement support ticketing with typed cases, evidence stitching, refund automation with dual approvals, chargeback workflows, DMCA takedown and counter-notice, and SLA timers. Provide admin consoles with role-based access, immutable audit logs, macros, and escalation workflows. Integrate email bridge with DKIM/DMARC verification and threading. Ensure accessibility and localization compliance.
acceptance_criteria: Help Center supports categorized articles with search and guided flows
Support ticketing manages typed cases with evidence and refund automation
DMCA workflows with takedown and counter-notice implemented
Admin consoles with RBAC, audit logs, macros, and SLA management
Email bridge supports inbound/outbound with DKIM/DMARC and threading
Accessibility and localization standards met
SLA targets for response and resolution achieved

title: Admin Console and Operational Tooling
description: Develop a comprehensive Admin Console with strict RBAC, just-in-time elevation, immutable audit logs, and separation of duties for finance, trust & safety, support, content, search curation, and documentation management. Provide tools for user and listing management, casework, finance operations, search curation, Smart Docs management, content operations, feature flags, and risk controls with two-person approvals. Implement immutable audit streams with WORM storage and chain hashes. Integrate observability dashboards and alerts for operational health.
acceptance_criteria: Admin Console enforces least privilege and JIT elevation with immutable audit logs
Role-based access controls separate finance, trust, support, content, and engineering duties
Dual approvals required for money moves and safety-impacting actions
Immutable audit streams stored with WORM and chain hashes
Operational dashboards and alerts monitor admin actions and system health
Admin workflows support case management, refunds, moderation, search curation, and feature flag governance

title: SEO, Performance, Accessibility, and Internationalization
description: Implement SEO best practices including canonical URLs, robots.txt, sitemaps, hreflang, structured data (JSON-LD for Person, Place, BreadcrumbList, FAQ), and noindex on gated or NSFW content. Enforce Core Web Vitals budgets (LCP ≤2.5s, CLS ≤0.1, INP ≤200ms) with ISR/SSR caching, image optimization, code splitting, and font loading strategies. Ensure WCAG 2.1/2.2 AA accessibility compliance with keyboard navigation, ARIA roles, contrast ratios, and screen reader support. Provide full i18n support with locale detection, ICU message formatting, RTL support, and localized metadata. Implement robust error handling and redirects.
acceptance_criteria: SEO canonical URLs, robots.txt, sitemaps, and hreflang implemented correctly
Structured data valid and excludes sensitive content
Core Web Vitals budgets met on mobile and desktop
WCAG 2.1/2.2 AA accessibility compliance verified
Internationalization with locale detection, ICU formatting, and RTL support
Error pages and redirects handle legacy and malformed URLs
Performance budgets met with caching and optimized assets

title: Experimentation and Analytics Framework
description: Build an experimentation platform supporting A/B, switchback, geo-cohort, and promotion holdout tests with pre-registered metrics, CUPED variance reduction, SRM guardrails, and auto-rollback on guardrail breaches. Implement deterministic assignment with stratification and stickiness, exposure and conversion event logging, and interference controls. Provide semantic-layer metrics catalog with versioning, lineage, and privacy enforcement. Integrate dashboards for experiment health, guardrails, and KPI monitoring. Ensure data quality with contract tests, anomaly detection, and lineage tracking.
acceptance_criteria: Experimentation platform supports multiple test designs with pre-registered metrics
Deterministic assignment with stratification and stickiness implemented
Exposure and conversion events logged with privacy compliance
Semantic-layer metrics catalog with versioning and lineage enforced
Dashboards monitor experiment health and guardrails with auto-rollback
Data quality tests and anomaly detection active
Experimentation integrates with search, promotions, and growth features

title: City Launch and Growth Operations
description: Plan and execute city launches with phased milestones: Pre-Launch, Launch Execution, Knowledge Transfer, and Post-Launch Monitoring. Implement city-specific KPIs, dashboards, and alerts for supply/demand, trust, promotions, and support. Develop supply seeding playbooks including verified studios and providers, demand seeding with RFPs and referrals, and local marketing campaigns with geo-targeted ads and events. Coordinate city teams including GM, Growth, Trust, Support, Finance, and Studios PM. Provide playbooks for troubleshooting, risk mitigation, and continuous improvement.
acceptance_criteria: City launch plans with phased milestones and go/no-go gates
City-specific KPIs and dashboards operational
Supply and demand seeding playbooks executed with verified participants
Local marketing campaigns with geo-targeted ads and events
Cross-functional city teams staffed and coordinated
Playbooks for troubleshooting and risk mitigation in place
Continuous knowledge sharing and improvement processes established

title: Operational Readiness, Security, and Compliance
description: Establish operational processes including incident management with SEV levels, on-call rotations, runbooks, and blameless postmortems. Implement security controls enforcing least-privilege RBAC, JIT elevation, immutable audit logs, secrets rotation, and vulnerability management. Ensure compliance with GDPR, CCPA, PCI DSS, FCRA, DMCA, and accessibility standards. Provide DSAR tooling with export and deletion workflows. Conduct quarterly drills for disaster recovery, security incidents, and operational readiness. Maintain risk registers with owners, dashboards, and mitigation plans.
acceptance_criteria: Incident management with SEV levels, on-call, and runbooks operational
Security controls enforce least privilege, JIT elevation, and audit logging
Compliance with GDPR, CCPA, PCI DSS, FCRA, DMCA, and accessibility standards
DSAR export and deletion workflows implemented with SLA adherence
Quarterly drills for disaster recovery and security incidents conducted
Risk registers maintained with owners, dashboards, and mitigation plans
Vulnerability management and secrets rotation processes active

title: Documentation, Runbooks, and Knowledge Base
description: Develop comprehensive documentation including architecture, API specs, admin guides, runbooks for incidents and operational procedures, and help center articles with SEO and accessibility compliance. Maintain version-controlled appendices with executive summaries and usage guides. Provide training materials for support, trust & safety, finance, and engineering teams. Ensure all user-facing copy aligns with help center content and avoids legal jargon. Implement tooling for documentation publishing, changelog tracking, and audit logging.
acceptance_criteria: Comprehensive documentation covering architecture, APIs, admin, and runbooks
Help center articles aligned with user-facing copy and SEO optimized
Version-controlled appendices with executive summaries and usage guides
Training materials for support, trust & safety, finance, and engineering teams
Documentation publishing and changelog tracking tooling operational
Audit logging for documentation changes and approvals

title: Orchestrator Improvements and Meta-QA
description: Enhance orchestrator with idempotence, state management, token discipline, and improved agent prompts. Implement meta-QA workflows for automated and manual quality assurance across agents. Develop usage tracking for agent activities and system metrics. Integrate orchestrator improvements with existing workflows ensuring stability and scalability. Provide documentation and training for orchestrator usage and QA processes.
acceptance_criteria: Orchestrator supports idempotent operations and robust state management
Agent prompts improved for clarity and efficiency
Meta-QA workflows automate quality checks and support manual reviews
Usage tracking captures agent activity and system metrics
Integration with existing workflows without regressions
Documentation and training materials for orchestrator and QA
